message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product for $950000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable.
Thank you for offering the unique product. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $850000 for the product.

I understand that you're working with a budget constraint, but I believe the product's value is worth more than what you've offered. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $900000. This is my final offer, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I must stick to my budget. I am unable to increase my offer beyond $875000 for the product.

I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $920000. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I respect your position and am willing to meet you at $890000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $890000, but I'm still not convinced that's the best price for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price of $950000. I'm counteroffering at $915000. This is my last offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable going above $895000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
